name: Vibram FiveFingers V-Aqua - Men's
description: Made for boats, rivers or kayaks, these foot gloves are ultra-thin and flexible enough to fit easily in a drybag. The sticky rubber sole gives you gecko-like grip on slick surfaces, and perforated soles drain and dry quickly.Polyester mesh upper is abrasion-resistant, stretchy and quick-drying.Drainage holes reduce the squelch factor.EVA insole is comfortable against your foot and dries quickly, with 2mm perforations to improve drainage.Megagrip rubber compound is non-marking and slip-resistant.Maximum sole thickness is 3.7mm.Machine wash cold, and air dry.
